featured.text: Concert reviews from the period mourned the fact that the armonica sounded wonderful—only when it could be heard.

definition.zh_def: 檢查或評估某事物的過程，通常是為了提供意見或改進。
definition.en_def: The process of examining or evaluating something, often to provide feedback or improvement.
definition.example: I need to review my notes before the exam.
